Description: This particular Broadkaster, the G6609TFM Players Edition, sports a Tiger Flame Maple body that, combined with its Dark Cherry Stain finish and gold hardware, makes for a striking aesthetic. The G6609TFM also has a chambered spruce center block and standard "U" shaped neck that make it incredibly comfortable and easy to play. USA-made Full'Tron pickups make this guitar sound great as well, making everything from classic chime to growling overdrive achievable. Previously applied to banjos and drums, Gretsch's "Broadkaster" is now synonymous with their premier center block guitars, and this one is no different.Condition: Excellent overall condition. No scratches or marks that I can see.Body: Broadkaster body shape with Center Block bracing, aged white binding, and arched laminated maple back/sides with a flame top. Nickel hardware, with Bigsby B7CP string-thru tailpiece, anchored Adjusto-Matic bridge, and Arrow control knobs.Neck: Maple neck with gloss finish and standard "U" shape. 24.6" scale length, 12" radius ebony fingerboard, aged white binding, Aged Pearloid Thumbnail inlays, and 22 medium jumbo frets.Electronics: Dual Full'Tron humbuckers with 3-way toggle switching. Individual pickup volume knobs, plus master tone and master volume knobs.Case: Gretsch hardshell case included.Weight: 7 lbs. 13 ounces.
